Sentencas: Hierarchically porous metal oxides are prepared using a novel self-rising approach.
Titulo: Self-rising approach to synthesize hierarchically porous metal oxides

Sentencas: The method is 'hard-template' free and relatively easy to perform, utilizes inexpensive precursors and processing conditions, and is versatile, thus offering tremendous opportunities with a wide variety of conditions to explore to synthesize single or mixed metal oxides with hierarchically porous structures.
Titulo: Self-rising approach to synthesize hierarchically porous metal oxides

Sentencas: Fe2O3, SM0.2Ce0.8O1.9, LaFeO3, LaCoO3, and La0.5Sr0.5Co0.5Fe0.5O3 have been successfully synthesized while Fe2O3 and La0.5Sr0.5Co0.5Fe0.5O3 as examples for single and mixed metal oxides have been studied in detail.
Titulo: Self-rising approach to synthesize hierarchically porous metal oxides

Sentencas: Sm0.2Ce0.8O1.9 has been applied as electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells, showing good sinterability and high conductivity.
Titulo: Self-rising approach to synthesize hierarchically porous metal oxides

Sentencas: A tentative scheme is provided to illustrate the pore formation mechanism using the self-rising approach.
Titulo: Self-rising approach to synthesize hierarchically porous metal oxides
